ComicInfo.Summary:
Reserved for Madmen Only: Gerald and Zena scheme to drive old Cyrus Potter insane so they can take his fortune.
A Hangman Awaits Me: The orphan Terrence Jones has an imaginary friend who keeps him safe from the mean Mr. Widdoes.
The Bewitched Beauty!: Myra makes a deal with a witch to win a beauty contest.
Prisoner of the Power-Stone!: While trying to turn other elements into gold, the alchemist Rondell created a magic stone that grants the holders every wish, but slowly turns them evil.
Captives of the Ant Kingdom!: Scott and his partner search for a lost gold mine and battle giant ants.
The Fearsome Fountain of Youth: Criminal Roger Hall is willing to pay a million dollars for a drink from what he believes is water from the Fountain of Youth.
The Doom Game: A couple of explorers find two pistols each loaded with three magic bullets, two will bring wealth, the other doom.
The Menace of the Fireball: A giant fireball from space threatens to melt the Earth.
Trial by Error: Bret and Harriet take refuge from a storm at a French hotel and are framed for murder.
Flame of Death: Three soldiers learn the hard way about the myth of never lighting three cigarettes on one match.
The End of Death: A criminal tries to convince Johnny Peril that he is being haunted by Death himself.
Nightmare House: Charlie Robbins, running from the law, takes refuge in a boarding house with a secret.
